title: FACT SHEET: The United States and India – Global Leadership in Action | The White House
content: President Biden hosted Prime Minister Narendra Modi today, forging closer ties between two leading Indo-Pacific powers, the United States and India. As the world’s oldest and largest democracies, the United States and India are committed to values of freedom, pluralism, openness, and respect for human rights.Working Together on the World StageProtecting the Planet and Powering the FutureGenerating Jobs and Mutual ProsperityAdvancing Security in the Indo-Pacific and BeyondExploring SpaceReinvigorating Science, Education, Innovation, and People-to-People Ties###
